text:
Special ‘puja’ was performed to Sri Viswanathar and Sri Visalakshi Ambal at Sri Viswanathaswamy temple in Vanjoor near here on the occasion of ‘Maattu Pongal’ on Saturday. The idols were taken out in a procession later.

Fishermen held by Lankan Navy

Three fishermen of Kottaipattinam, who ventured in to sea on Saturday, were arrested by Sri Lankan naval personnel early Sunday.

According to official sources, the fishermen -- R. Balu (32), D. Parthiban (23) and K. Santhosh (28) ventured into sea from Kottaipattinam. They were intercepted by the naval personnel and arrested on a charge of having trespassed beyond the International Maritime Boundary Line.

Road roko

Bull owners of a cluster of villages who had gathered, along with the animals, in the grounds of Sri Mariamman temple at Kulamanickam village near Tirumanur, resorted to road roko for a while after the police had prevented them from their attempt to organise the jallikattu.

They all dispersed later.
title: Special puja
